about_the_game:
Mysterious Omda

On the mysterious island of Omda lives a group of Omda people who make a living by collecting the island's rich variety of fruits. They collect a lot of fruit every day, but only a small part is used for food, and most of them are exchanged for gold coins. When the Omuda earn enough gold, they will come to the temple in the center of the island.

Brilliant gem

In the center of the temple in the center of the island is an ancient altar. The narration of the altar is an equally ancient melting furnace. The Omda people put gold coins into it, and the gold coins become crystal clear gems in an instant. The Omdas then place the gems on the altar, and after an ancient ritual, these gems become even more dazzling. Every Omda dreamer of the ultimate gem that is priceless.

A ceremony full of opportunities

Although the ritual of obtaining gems is simple enough, not everyone can get their favorite gems. Because in this ancient and mysterious ritual, there will always be some gems that disappear inexplicably, or degenerate into ordinary low-level gems. It is precisely because of this that the ancient and mysterious altar will attract generations of Omuda people to come and try their luck, hoping to get the gem that belongs to them.

Gameplay

Collect fruits scattered on the island and exchange them for gold coins
Buy junior gems with gold coins
Place gems in altars to craft
Harvest dazzling gems

There are more than 30 dynamic pictures of beautiful girls, and there are a variety of interactive animations and animation states

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Sexual Content, General Mature Content.
All characters are over 18 years old.
Does not contain sexual assault/non-consensual sex, drug/alcohol abuse, self-harm or suicide.

name: Lucky Gem

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: WIN7 SP1/WIN8/WIN10/XP
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
